verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, Concerning the feasts<WH4150> of the LORD<WH3068>, which ye shall proclaim<WH7121> to be holy<WH6944> convocations<WH4744>, even these are my feasts<WH4150>.

Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> shall work<WH4399> be done<WH6213>: but the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is the sabbath<WH7676> of rest<WH7677>, an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; ye shall do<WH6213> no work<WH4399> therein: it is the sabbath<WH7676> of the LORD<WH3068> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.
¶ These are the feasts<WH4150> of the LORD<WH3068>, even holy<WH6944> convocations<WH4744>, which ye shall proclaim<WH7121> in their seasons<WH4150>.
In the fourteenth<WH702><WH6240> day of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> at even<WH6153> is the LORD's<WH3068> passover<WH6453>.

And on the fifteenth<WH2568><WH6240> day<WH3117> of the same month<WH2320> is the feast<WH2282> of unleavened bread<WH4682> unto the LORD<WH3068>: seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> ye must eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682>.
In the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> ye shall have an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein.

But ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>: in the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein.
¶ And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, When ye be come<WH935> into the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> unto you, and shall reap<WH7114> the harvest<WH7105> thereof, then ye shall bring<WH935> a sheaf<WH6016> of the firstfruits<WH7225> of your harvest<WH7105> unto the priest<WH3548>:
And he shall wave<WH5130> the sheaf<WH6016> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, to be accepted<WH7522> for you: on the morrow<WH4283> after the sabbath<WH7676> the priest<WH3548> shall wave<WH5130> it.

And ye shall offer<WH6213> that day<WH3117> when ye wave<WH5130> the sheaf<WH6016> an he lamb<WH3532> without blemish<WH8549> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> for a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And the meat offering<WH4503> thereof shall be two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068> for a sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381>: and the drink offering<WH5262> thereof shall be of wine<WH3196>, the fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969>.

And ye shall eat<WH398> neither bread<WH3899>, nor parched corn<WH7039>, nor green ears<WH3759>, until the selfsame<WH6106><WH2088> day<WH3117> that<WH5704> ye have brought<WH935> an offering<WH7133> unto your God<WH430>: it shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.

¶ And ye shall count<WH5608> unto you from the morrow<WH4283> after the sabbath<WH7676>, from the day<WH3117> that ye brought<WH935> the sheaf<WH6016> of the wave offering<WH8573>; seven<WH7651> sabbaths<WH7676> shall be<WH1961> complete<WH8549>:

Even unto<WH5704> the morrow<WH4283> after the seventh<WH7637> sabbath<WH7676> shall ye number<WH5608> fifty<WH2572> days<WH3117>; and ye shall offer<WH7126> a new<WH2319> meat offering<WH4503> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

Ye shall bring out<WH935> of your habitations<WH4186> two<WH8147> wave<WH8573> loaves<WH3899> of two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241>: they shall be of fine flour<WH5560>; they shall be baken<WH644> with leaven<WH2557>; they are the firstfruits<WH1061> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And ye shall offer<WH7126> with the bread<WH3899> seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> without blemish<WH8549> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141>, and one<WH259> young<WH1241><WH1121> bullock<WH6499>, and two<WH8147> rams<WH352>: they shall be for a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the LORD<WH3068>, with their meat offering<WH4503>, and their drink offerings<WH5262>, even an offering made by fire<WH801>, of sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

Then ye shall sacrifice<WH6213> one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>, and two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall wave<WH5130> them with the bread<WH3899> of the firstfruits<WH1061> for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, with the two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532>: they shall be holy<WH6944> to the LORD<WH3068> for the priest<WH3548>.

And ye shall proclaim<WH7121> on the selfsame<WH6106> day<WH3117>, that it may be an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744> unto you: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein: it shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> in all your dwellings<WH4186> throughout your generations<WH1755>.

¶ And when ye reap<WH7114> the harvest<WH7105> of your land<WH776>, thou shalt not make clean riddance<WH3615> of the corners<WH6285> of thy field<WH7704> when thou reapest<WH7114>, neither shalt thou gather<WH3950> any gleaning<WH3951> of thy harvest<WH7105>: thou shalt leave<WH5800> them unto the poor<WH6041>, and to the stranger<WH1616>: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
¶ And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, In the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, in the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, shall ye have a sabbath<WH7677>, a memorial<WH2146> of blowing<WH8643> of trumpets, an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>.
Ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein: but ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>.
¶ And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Also<WH389> on the tenth<WH6218> day of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> there shall be a day<WH3117> of atonement<WH3725>: it shall be an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744> unto you; and ye shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>, and offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And ye shall do<WH6213> no work<WH4399> in that same<WH6106> day<WH3117>: for it is a day<WH3117> of atonement<WH3725>, to make an atonement<WH3722> for you before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
For whatsoever soul<WH5315> it be that shall not be afflicted<WH6031> in that same<WH6106> day<WH3117>, he shall be cut off<WH3772> from among his people<WH5971>.
And whatsoever soul<WH5315> it be that doeth<WH6213> any work<WH4399> in that same<WH6106> day<WH3117>, the same soul<WH5315> will I destroy<WH6> from among<WH7130> his people<WH5971>.
Ye shall do<WH6213> no manner of work<WH4399>: it shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.

It shall be unto you a sabbath<WH7676> of rest<WH7677>, and ye shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>: in the ninth<WH8672> day of the month<WH2320> at even<WH6153>, from even<WH6153> unto even<WH6153>, shall ye celebrate<WH7673> your sabbath<WH7676>.
¶ And the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, The fifteenth<WH2568><WH6240> day<WH3117> of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> shall be the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521> for seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> unto the LORD<WH3068>.
On the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> shall be an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein.

Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>: on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> shall be an holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744> unto you; and ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>: it is a solemn assembly<WH6116>; and ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein.

These are the feasts<WH4150> of the LORD<WH3068>, which ye shall proclaim<WH7121> to be holy<WH6944> convocations<WH4744>, to offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>, a burnt offering<WH5930>, and a meat offering<WH4503>, a sacrifice<WH2077>, and drink offerings<WH5262>, every thing<WH1697> upon his<WH3117> day<WH3117>:

Beside the sabbaths<WH7676> of the LORD<WH3068>, and beside your gifts<WH4979>, and beside all your vows<WH5088>, and beside all your freewill offerings<WH5071>, which ye give<WH5414> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

Also in the fifteenth<WH2568><WH6240> day<WH3117> of the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, when ye have gathered<WH622> in the fruit<WH8393> of the land<WH776>, ye shall keep<WH2287> a feast<WH2282> unto the LORD<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>: on the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> shall be a sabbath<WH7677>, and on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> shall be a sabbath<WH7677>.

And ye shall take<WH3947> you on the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> the boughs<WH6529> of goodly<WH1926> trees<WH6086>, branches<WH3709> of palm<WH8558> trees, and the boughs<WH6057> of thick<WH5687> trees<WH6086>, and willows<WH6155> of the brook<WH5158>; and ye shall rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>.

And ye shall keep<WH2287> it a feast<WH2282> unto the LORD<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> in the year<WH8141>. It shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> in your generations<WH1755>: ye shall celebrate<WH2287> it in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>.
Ye shall dwell<WH3427> in booths<WH5521> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>; all that are Israelites<WH3478> born<WH249> shall dwell<WH3427> in booths<WH5521>:

That your generations<WH1755> may know<WH3045> that I made the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to dwell<WH3427> in booths<WH5521>, when I brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
And Moses<WH4872> declared<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> the feasts<WH4150> of the LORD<WH3068>.
